docs.title: Welcome to User Behavior Insights (UBI)!
docs.text: UBI is a data standard along with a collection of tools and search engine plugins created to help search engineers gain and utilize an improved understanding of users' actions.

docs.title: Reference Implementation
docs.text: A full reference implementation using OpenSearch is available at chorus-opensearch-edition.

docs.title: User Behavior Insights Standard
docs.text:
The most important part of UBI is its standard that defines how queries and user events are defined.

  • UBI Standard

docs.title: Tools and Plugins
docs.text: There are several available tools and plugins supporting UBI.
